titleInfo.title: The Myth of Urban Unity. Religion and Social Performance in Late Medieval Braunschweig
Cities, Texts, and Social Networks, 400-1500: Experiences and Perceptions of Medieval Urban Space

bibliographicCitation.apa: Arlinghaus, F. - J. (2010). The Myth of Urban Unity. Religion and Social Performance in Late Medieval Braunschweig. In C. Goodson, A. E. Lester, & C. Symes (Eds.), Cities, Texts, and Social Networks, 400-1500: Experiences and Perceptions of Medieval Urban Space (pp. 215-232). Farnham: Ashgate.
